page.title: 19Transport and Vehicles
page.content:
Apart from bicycles, the most common vehicle owned by families in Powburn area is the tractor. This is to be expected in a farming area. A total of twentyone tractors were owned by five families in our class. All these tractors were used for work on the farms.
Only three families out of twelve represented in our class had only one car.All the other families had two cars.Five families, in addition to cars, also had landrovers or pick-ups.
Noone in our class used public transport regularly and a ride on a bus is a very rare event for everyone. One girl went to Newcastle by bus with her Granny last holiday and another person remembered a bus trip to Edinburgh Zoo two years ago.
